validation.custom.registration.full_name: The full name field is required.
validation.custom.registration.email_req: The email field is required for registration.
validation.custom.registration.email_for: The email provided for registration must be a valid email address.
validation.custom.registration.document_: The country of origin for your document is required.
validation.custom.registration.address_c: The country of residence is required.
validation.custom.registration.selected_: You must select at least one event to register.
One of the selected events is invalid.
validation.custom.registration.other_die: Please specify your other dietary restrictions.
validation.custom.registration.codpes_nu: The USP Number (codpes) must be a number.
validation.custom.registration.codpes_di: The USP Number (codpes) must be between :min and :max digits.
validation.custom.registration.confirm_i: You must confirm that the information provided is accurate.
validation.custom.registration.confirm_d: You must consent to the processing of your data.
validation.custom.registration.departure: The departure date must be after or equal to the arrival date.
validation.custom.registration.cpf_requi: The CPF is required if the document country of origin is Brazil.
validation.custom.registration.rg_number: The RG Number is required if the document country of origin is Brazil.
validation.custom.registration.passport_: The Passport Number is required if the document country of origin is not Brazil.
The Passport Expiry Date is required if the document country of origin is not Brazil and a passport number is provided.
The passport expiry date must be a date after or equal to today.
